countries.NAME: Afghanistan
countries.DESCRIPTION: Kabuli palaw is a variety of pilaf consisting of steamed rice mixed with raisins, carrots, and beef or lamb.

countries.NAME: Angola
countries.DESCRIPTION: Muamba de galinha (or chicken moamba) is chicken with palm paste, okra, garlic and palm oil hash or red palm oil sauce, often served with rice and funge.

countries.NAME: Albania
countries.DESCRIPTION: Tavë kosi is a dish of lamb and rice baked with yogurt, eggs and a roux.

countries.NAME: Andorra
countries.DESCRIPTION: Escudella de pagés is a thick soup that consists of white beans, ham bone, veal or beed marrow bone, chicken, pork sausage, cured ham cabbage, potatoes, rice and pasta.

countries.NAME: United Arab Emirates
countries.DESCRIPTION: Harees is a kind of seasoned porridge made of mear and mixed with meat (often lamb or chicken).

countries.NAME: Argentina
countries.DESCRIPTION: Empanadas are small savoury pastries that can either be baked or fried and typically contain a mixture of beef and vegetables.

countries.NAME: Armenia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Dolma refers to a family of stuffed vegetable dishes. They are often wrapped in grape or cabbage leaves with a meat-and-rice filling.

countries.NAME: Antarctica
countries.DESCRIPTION: There's not much else...

countries.NAME: Antigua and Barb.
countries.DESCRIPTION: Fungee and Pepperpot is a hearty one-pot meaty stew served with a side of cornmeal with okra.

countries.NAME: Australia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Australian meat pies are traditionally hand-sized with a filling of minced meat, gravy and onions.

countries.NAME: Austria
countries.DESCRIPTION: Wiener schnitzel is a very thin cutlet of meat (typically veal) that has been breaded and fried.

countries.NAME: Azerbaijan
countries.DESCRIPTION: Yarpaq dolmasi are a kind of dolma (stuffed vine leaves) with meat, rice, salt, pepper and herbs.

countries.NAME: Burundi
countries.DESCRIPTION: A simple stew of red beans with onion and chilli.

countries.NAME: Belgium
countries.DESCRIPTION: Moules-frites is a dish of mussels served with potato chips (fries)

countries.NAME: Benin
countries.DESCRIPTION: Kuli-kuli is a popular fried snack made primarily from ground peanuts.

countries.NAME: Burkina Faso
countries.DESCRIPTION: Riz gras is a one pot dish made of meat, rice, caroots, cabbage, tomatoes and spices.

countries.NAME: Bangladesh
countries.DESCRIPTION: Ilish macher paturi is mad with fish that has been marinated in spices and wrapped in a banana lead before being steamed or roasted.

countries.NAME: Bulgaria
countries.DESCRIPTION: Shopska salad is a salad made from tomatoes, cucumbers, peppers, onion and grated sirene cheese.

countries.NAME: Bahrain
countries.DESCRIPTION: Machboos is a traditional rice dish cooked with a mix of spices, tomatoes and chicken.

countries.NAME: Bahamas
countries.DESCRIPTION: Cracked Conch is breaded and deep-fried conch served with peas and rice.

countries.NAME: Bosnia and Herz.
countries.DESCRIPTION: Ćevapi is a dish of grilled meat that is often served with flatbread and avjar, a spivy red pepper sauce.

countries.NAME: Belarus
countries.DESCRIPTION: Draniki are a kind of grated potatoe pancake served with sour cream.

countries.NAME: Belize
countries.DESCRIPTION: Rice and beans are cooked in coconut milk and served with meat

countries.NAME: Bolivia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Salteñas are crescent-shaped pastries filled with meat and a sweet, spicy sauce.

countries.NAME: Brazil
countries.DESCRIPTION: Feijoada is a stew of pork, beef and black beans with onion, garlic and spices.

countries.NAME: Barbados
countries.DESCRIPTION: Flying fish are marinated and served with a creole sauce and cou cou, a mixture of cornmeal and okra.

countries.NAME: Brunei
countries.DESCRIPTION: Ambuyat is a kind of starch made from sago palm. It is typically served with other dishes, such as meat or prawns.

countries.NAME: Bhutan
countries.DESCRIPTION: Ema Datshi is a dish made from chilli and cheese that is often served with Bhutanese red rice.

countries.NAME: Botswana
countries.DESCRIPTION: Seswaa is a simple dish of cooked cuts of meat (typically beef) that is cooked slowly over an open fire.

countries.NAME: Central African Rep.
countries.DESCRIPTION: Kanda are meatballs made from ground beef and pumpkin seeds.

countries.NAME: Canada
countries.DESCRIPTION: Poutine is made from chips (french fries) covered in cheese curds and gravy.

countries.NAME: Switzerland
countries.DESCRIPTION: Rosti are golden and crispy pan fried grated potatoes.

countries.NAME: Chile
countries.DESCRIPTION: Curanto is a traditional meal of seafood, meat, potatoes and vegetables cooked on hot stones underground.

countries.NAME: China
countries.DESCRIPTION: Peking duck is a dish of duck that has been specially roasted so it has very crispy skin.

countries.NAME: Côte d'Ivoire
countries.DESCRIPTION: Atcheke is a side dish made from fermented cassava pulp that has been grated or granulated.

countries.NAME: Cameroon
countries.DESCRIPTION: Ndole is a stew typically made with peanuts, greens, prawns and ground beef.

countries.NAME: Dem. Rep. Congo
countries.DESCRIPTION: Poulet à la moambé is a stew made with chicken, spices and palm butter.

countries.NAME: Congo
countries.DESCRIPTION: Chikwangue is a cassava loaf that is prepared whilst wrapped in a banana leaf.

countries.NAME: Colombia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Aijaco is a hearty chicken soup with potatoes and corn.

countries.NAME: Comoros
countries.DESCRIPTION: Langouste a la vanille is a dish of lobsters served with a vanilla cream sauce.

countries.NAME: Cabo Verde
countries.DESCRIPTION: Cachupa is a slow cooked stew of fish or meat with beans, cassava, sweet potato and blood sausage.

countries.NAME: Costa Rica
countries.DESCRIPTION: Gallo pinto is a dish of beans and rice, often with onion, garlic and bell peppers.

countries.NAME: Cuba
countries.DESCRIPTION: Ropa vieja is a dish of pulled steak served with vegetables and aromatics.

countries.NAME: Cyprus
countries.DESCRIPTION: Souvla consists of large pieces of meat cooked on a skewer over a charcoal barbeque.

countries.NAME: Czechia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Vepřo-knedlo-zelo is a dish of roast pork served with dumplings and sauerkraut.

countries.NAME: Germany
countries.DESCRIPTION: Sauerbraten is a heavily marinated roast (typically beef) served with gravy and potatoes.

countries.NAME: Djibouti
countries.DESCRIPTION: Skoudehkaris is a spicy one-pot dish of lamb, tomatoes and rice

countries.NAME: Dominica
countries.DESCRIPTION: Callaloo is a thick soup of leafy greens, coconut milk, salted meat, yams, peppers, onion and plantains.

countries.NAME: Denmark
countries.DESCRIPTION: Stegt flæsk is fried pork belly served with potatoes, a white sauce and parsley.

countries.NAME: Dominican Rep.
countries.DESCRIPTION: La Bandera, named after the national flag, is a dish of chicken served with rice and beans.

countries.NAME: Algeria
countries.DESCRIPTION: Couscous is made from steamed semolina and regularly served with meat, vegetables and spices.

countries.NAME: Ecuador
countries.DESCRIPTION: Encebollado is a fish stew served with boiled cassava and pickled red onion.

countries.NAME: Egypt
countries.DESCRIPTION: Ful medames is a dish of fava beans cooked with oil, cumin, parsley, garlic, onion and lemon juice.

countries.NAME: Eritrea
countries.DESCRIPTION: Zigini is a spicy beef stew that is served with injera, a spongy, sour, fermented flatbread.

countries.NAME: Spain
countries.DESCRIPTION: Tortilla de Patatas is a dense omlette that contains potato and optionally some onion.

countries.NAME: Estonia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Verivorst is a type of traditional blood sausage that is often served with a kind of sauerkraut called mulgikapsad.

countries.NAME: Ethiopia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Doro wat is a meat (chicken, beef or lamb) stew with vegetables and berbere spice served on injera, a sour spongy flatbread.

countries.NAME: Finland
countries.DESCRIPTION: Rye bread is a kind of bread made from rye flour. It can bne light or dark in colour depending on its preparation.

countries.NAME: Fiji
countries.DESCRIPTION: Fijian kokoda is a dish of raw fish marinated in lime and coconut milk.

countries.NAME: France
countries.DESCRIPTION: Pot-au-feu is a beef stew containing oxtail, root vegetables and spices, often served at Christmas.

countries.NAME: Micronesia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Pihlohlo mwehng consists of taro root coated with coconut sap syrup.

countries.NAME: Gabon
countries.DESCRIPTION: Poulet nyembwe is a spicy chicken dish cooked in palm oil, served with rice, plantain or mashed yams.

countries.NAME: United Kingdom
countries.DESCRIPTION: Fish and chips is a dish of fried fish (often cod or haddock) fried in batter and served with potato chips.

countries.NAME: Georgia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Khinkali are dumplings with a twisted top that have been stuffed with meat and spices.

countries.NAME: Ghana
countries.DESCRIPTION: Fufu is a rough dough often made from starchy food crops such as cassava and yam. It is white and sticky and usually eaten as a side with soups or stews.

countries.NAME: Guinea
countries.DESCRIPTION: Poulet yassa is a simple dish of chicken that has been marinated in onion and lemon and served with rice.

countries.NAME: Gambia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Domoda is a peanut stew cooked with chicken, seasonal vegetables (usually pumpkin and sweet potato) and a saucy base.

countries.NAME: Guinea-Bissau
countries.DESCRIPTION: Egusi soup is a thick, rich soup made with ground egusi (melon) seeds, vegetables and meat or seafood.

countries.NAME: Eq. Guinea
countries.DESCRIPTION: Succotash is a dish made up of sweet corn and lima beans, with extra optional ingredients including meat, tomatoes, peppers and okra.

countries.NAME: Greece
countries.DESCRIPTION: Moussaka is a dish made of layers of either aubergine or potatoes, minced meat (usually lamb) and a creamy sauce.

countries.NAME: Grenada
countries.DESCRIPTION: Oil down is a stew of local vegetables (such as breadfruit), green bananas and salted meat that have been cooked in a mixture of spices and coconut milk.

countries.NAME: Greenland
countries.DESCRIPTION: Suaasat is a thick broth or soup that is traditionally made with seal meat, onions and potatoes..

countries.NAME: Guatemala
countries.DESCRIPTION: Chicken pepian is a stew containing chicken, vegetables and fuits (such as pear, squash, carrot, potato and corn) and mixture of spices.

countries.NAME: Guyana
countries.DESCRIPTION: Pepperpot is a meat stew with a dark, rich gravy that contains spices and the local cassareep syrup.

countries.NAME: Honduras
countries.DESCRIPTION: Plato típico is a meal of grilled meat, plantains, beans, chismol (a salsa of tomato, red pepper and onion) and rice.

countries.NAME: Croatia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Zagorski štrukli are made from thin (filo) pastry that is filled with cottage cheese, butter and cream.

countries.NAME: Haiti
countries.DESCRIPTION: Griot is made from cubes of pork shoulder that is cooked in aromatics and citrus juices, often sevred with pikilz (pickled shredded vegetables).

countries.NAME: Hungary
countries.DESCRIPTION: Goulash is a thick soup seasoned with paprika and containing beef, onions and other vegetables such as potatoes, carrots, pepper and tomatoes.

countries.NAME: Indonesia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Nasi goreng is a dish of fried rice with meat (traditionally chicken), vegetables, sweet soy sauce (kecap manis) and served with a fried egg

countries.NAME: India
countries.DESCRIPTION: Due to its diversity, India has purposefully chosen not to have a national dish, however a very popular candidate would be khichdi, which is a dish of rice and lentils with cumin, turmeric and other spices.

countries.NAME: Ireland
countries.DESCRIPTION: Irish stew is a thick stew of mutton and root vegetables garnished with parsley.

countries.NAME: Iran
countries.DESCRIPTION: Abgoosht is a lamb stew thickened with chickpeas, also containing beans, onion, potatoes, tomatoes, turmeric and sour grapes or dried lime.

countries.NAME: Iraq
countries.DESCRIPTION: Masgouf is a dish of grilled carp that is seasoned with salt, lemon juice and curry powder.

countries.NAME: Iceland
countries.DESCRIPTION: Hákarl is a dish of greenland shark that is cured, fermented and hung to dry for four to five months.

countries.NAME: Israel
countries.DESCRIPTION: Falafel are deep fried balls of ground chickpeas or favabeans, and fresh herbs. They are often served with tahini, hummus, pita bread and salad.

countries.NAME: Italy
countries.DESCRIPTION: Pizza consists of a round dough base topped with tomatoes, cheese and a wide selection of other optional toppings, traditionally baked at a high temperature in a wood-fired oven.

countries.NAME: Jamaica
countries.DESCRIPTION: Ackee and saltfish is a dish of ackee (a local fruit), salted fish, onions, tomatoes, peppers and spices like thyme and chilli.

countries.NAME: Jordan
countries.DESCRIPTION: Mansaf is a lamb dish with a sauce called jameed that is made from fermented dried yoghurt, often served with rice or bulgur.

countries.NAME: Japan
countries.DESCRIPTION: Sushi is typically made with sticky vinegared rice accompanied with other ingredients, most commonly raw seafood, seaweed and vegetables.

countries.NAME: Kazakhstan
countries.DESCRIPTION: Beshbarmak is a dish of boiled meat (mutton, beef, horse or camel) served with noodles and onions, typically eaten with one's hands.

countries.NAME: Kenya
countries.DESCRIPTION: Sukuma wiki is a dish of braised greens (such as kale, spinach or collard greens) an tomatoes, often eaten alongside other dishes and roasted meat.

countries.NAME: Kyrgyzstan
countries.DESCRIPTION: Kuurdak is a dish made from roasted meat (typically mutton), offal and onions cooked in fat and oil.

countries.NAME: Cambodia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Samlar kakou is a traditional soup made from kroeung paste, vegetables and fish, pork or chicken.

countries.NAME: Kiribati
countries.DESCRIPTION: Palusami is a dish that typically contains coconut cream and corned beef wrapped in taro leaves.

countries.NAME: St. Kitts and Nevis
countries.DESCRIPTION: Stewed saltfish is a fish stew, often served with spicy fried plantains, coconut dumplings and breadfruit.

countries.NAME: South Korea
countries.DESCRIPTION: Kimchi is a side dish made from vegetables (often napa cabbage and Korean radish) that have been fermented with red pepepr flakes, spring onions, garlic and ginger.

countries.NAME: Kosovo
countries.DESCRIPTION: Flia consists of many layers of thin pancakes that have been brushed with cream and then served with sour cream.

countries.NAME: Kuwait
countries.DESCRIPTION: Machboos laham is a rice dish containing a mix of fried onions, raisins and split peas, often served with meat (either lamb or chicken).

countries.NAME: Laos
countries.DESCRIPTION: Larb is a meat (often pork) salad made with corriander, mint, spring onions, shallots, chilli, lime and rice.

countries.NAME: Lebanon
countries.DESCRIPTION: Kibbeh is a dish of croquettes of ground meat, bulgur wheat, pine nuts and spices that are then deep fried.

countries.NAME: Liberia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Dumboy is a dish made from cassava that is boiler and pounder into a dough and shaped into balls. It is often served with meat stock or pepper soup.

countries.NAME: Libya
countries.DESCRIPTION: Kusksu is a couscous dish served with beef, chickpeas and vegetables (such as pumpkin) cooked in a spicy sauce.

countries.NAME: Saint Lucia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Green fig and saltdish is a dish of cured fish that is cooked with spices and vegetables, then served with green figs (the local name for unripe bananas).

countries.NAME: Liechtenstein
countries.DESCRIPTION: Käsknöpfle is a dish made from spaetzle (a type of pasta) served in a cheese sauce with onions sprinkled on top.

countries.NAME: Sri Lanka
countries.DESCRIPTION: This dish consists of either steamed or boiled rice with some sort of curry (vegetable, fish or meat), typically heavily spiced with turmeric and coconut milk.

countries.NAME: Lesotho
countries.DESCRIPTION: Chakalaka is a stew of vegetables (carrots, onions, peppers and tomatoes) served with pap-pap, a dough made from cornmeal.

countries.NAME: Lithuania
countries.DESCRIPTION: Cepelinai are potato dumplings stuffed with meat, cheese or mushrooms and often served with a bacon gravy and sour cream.

countries.NAME: Luxembourg
countries.DESCRIPTION: Judd mat Gaardebounen is a dish of smoked pork served with stewed broad beans and potatoes.

countries.NAME: Latvia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Pelēkie zirņi ar speķi is a stew made from grey peas, fried onions and dried speck.

countries.NAME: Morocco
countries.DESCRIPTION: Tagine is a stew of meat and vegetables, often containing spices, nuts and dried fruits such as raisins and served in an earthenware pot.

countries.NAME: Monaco
countries.DESCRIPTION: Barbajuan is a stuffed savoury pastry filled with Swiss chard and ricotta cheese.

countries.NAME: Moldova
countries.DESCRIPTION: Mămăligă is a traditional porridge made out of yellow maize flour, often served with hearty stews.

countries.NAME: Madagascar
countries.DESCRIPTION: Romazava is a stew of meat (traditionally zebu) and leafy greens (paracress, anamamy and mustard greens), cooked with tomatoes and onions.

countries.NAME: Maldives
countries.DESCRIPTION: Gulha are small round dumplings stuffed with tuna, onion, coconut and chilli.

countries.NAME: Mexico
countries.DESCRIPTION: Mole is a sauce and marinade made from spicy chillis, bitter chocolate, peanuts, tomatoes, onion, garlic and spices.

countries.NAME: Marshall Is.
countries.DESCRIPTION: Barramundi cod is cooked by seasoning the whole fresh fish, wrapping it in banana leaves and then baking.

countries.NAME: Macedonia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Tavče gravče is a bean and vegetable stew (sometimes containing meat) cooked in a terracota pot.

countries.NAME: Mali
countries.DESCRIPTION: Tiguadege na is a rich peanut and vegetable stew (sometimes containing meat).

countries.NAME: Malta
countries.DESCRIPTION: Stuffat tal-fenek is a slow-cooked rabbit stew with potatoes, carrots, bay leaves and red wine.

countries.NAME: Myanmar
countries.DESCRIPTION: Mohinga is a soup of rice noodles and fish that has been flavoured with lemongrass and served with a boiled egg.

countries.NAME: Montenegro
countries.DESCRIPTION: Čorba is a fish soup made from fish stock with vegetables, such as carrots, onion, celery, garlic and parsley.

countries.NAME: Mongolia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Buuz are a style of steamed dumplings filled with spiced meat (usually mutton).

countries.NAME: Mozambique
countries.DESCRIPTION: Xima is a type of stiff porridge made from ground corn flour and water.

countries.NAME: Mauritania
countries.DESCRIPTION: Thieboudienne is a rice and fish dish served with a tomato sauce.

countries.NAME: Mauritius
countries.DESCRIPTION: Dholl Puri is a type of wrap or flatbread made from yellow split peas, often eaten with different curries or pickles.

countries.NAME: Malawi
countries.DESCRIPTION: Chambo is a freshwater fish from Lake Malawi that can be dried, roasted or fried and served with nshima, a maize flour porridge.

countries.NAME: Malaysia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Nasi lemak is a dish of coconut milk rice served with spicy sambal, fried anchovies cucumber, peanuts and egg.

countries.NAME: Namibia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Pap is a cornmeal porridge that is regularly served alongside sauces, meats, fish and vegetables.

countries.NAME: Niger
countries.DESCRIPTION: Djerma is a stew that can be made with or without meat, consisting of peanuts, onions, tomatoes, thyme, spices and stock.

countries.NAME: Nigeria
countries.DESCRIPTION: Jollof rice is a rice dish that most commonly contains tomatoes, onions, salt and pepper, along with meat, chilli, other vegetables and spices such as nutmeg, thyme and parsley.

countries.NAME: Nicaragua
countries.DESCRIPTION: Nacatamales are made from corn dough, pork or chicken, potato, tomato, raisins, chili, peanuts and other ingredients cooked inside a banana leaf.

countries.NAME: Netherlands
countries.DESCRIPTION: Stamppot is a dish of mashed potatoes that can be mixed with various other ingredients, such as carrots, onions, kale or bacon.

countries.NAME: Norway
countries.DESCRIPTION: Fårikål is a dish made from mutton and cabbage cooked with black peppercorns, salt, water and flour.

countries.NAME: Nepal
countries.DESCRIPTION: Dal bhat is a lentil curry spiced with cumin, coriander, turmeric and chile, often served with white rice, pickles and greens.

countries.NAME: Nauru
countries.DESCRIPTION: Coconut crusted fish is made by dipping fillets of white fish in lime, salt and pepper, before being rolled in flour, eggs and grated coconut before being cooked.

countries.NAME: New Zealand
countries.DESCRIPTION: Kiwi pies are savoury pies containing meat, usually beef and gravy, with different varieties including different ingredients.

countries.NAME: Oman
countries.DESCRIPTION: Shuwa is a dish of lamb or goat that is marinated in a rub of spices, garlic and oil before being slow cooked.

countries.NAME: Pakistan
countries.DESCRIPTION: Nihari is a slow cooked stew of meat, strong spices and thickened with flour, often served with lemon wedges, green chillies and julienned ginger.

countries.NAME: Panama
countries.DESCRIPTION: Sancocho is a chicken soup made with corriander, yucca, corn, onion, garlic and oregano.

countries.NAME: Peru
countries.DESCRIPTION: Ceviche is a dish of raw fish that has been marinated in cirtus juice (usually lemon or lime), often served with sliced red onions and sometimes other vegetables.

countries.NAME: Philippines
countries.DESCRIPTION: Adobo is a dish of chicken (usually thigh meat) that is marinated with soy sauce, ginger, vinegar, onion, garlic, pepper, sugar and bayleaves.

countries.NAME: Palau
countries.DESCRIPTION: Palauan style broiled fish is made from whole fish that is seasoned with garlic, ginger, soy sauce, sesame oil and lime leves, cooked in banana leaves.

countries.NAME: Papua New Guinea
countries.DESCRIPTION: Mumu is a traditional way to prepare food using a pit filled with hot stones to cook a mixture of fruits, vegetables, root crops and meat.

countries.NAME: Poland
countries.DESCRIPTION: Bigos is a meat stew that can be made with different meats, spicy polish sausage, cabbage, sauerkraut, tomatoes, onion and garlic.

countries.NAME: North Korea
countries.DESCRIPTION: Naengmyeon is a cold noodle dish made with a broth of kimchi brine and beef stock, served with cucumbers, Korean pear and boiled egg.

countries.NAME: Portugal
countries.DESCRIPTION: Bacalhau is a dish of dried and salted cod that can be prepared in a large variety of ways, such as bacalhau à brás, where the fish is shredded and served with potatoes.

countries.NAME: Paraguay
countries.DESCRIPTION: Sopa paraguaya is a cheesy cornbread made from corn flour, cheese, milk and onions.

countries.NAME: Palestine
countries.DESCRIPTION: Maqluba is a one pot dish made of layers of rice, vegetables and meat (or sometimes without) that is flipped upside down before being served.

countries.NAME: Qatar
countries.DESCRIPTION: Majboos is a dish made with slow cooked lamb or chicken served with seasoned rice, salad and a tomato sauce.

countries.NAME: Romania
countries.DESCRIPTION: Sarmale are a dish of cabbage leaves or sauerkraut wrapped around ground pork, onions, parsley and dill.

countries.NAME: Russia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Pelmeni are small dumplings filled with beef, pork and spices, most commonly served with sour cream and dill.

countries.NAME: Rwanda
countries.DESCRIPTION: Brochettes are made by cooking meat (goat, beef, chicken or pork) on skewers, often served with potatoes or roasted bananas.

countries.NAME: Saudi Arabia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Kabsa is a mixed rice dish containing meat (often chicken), vegetables and a mixture of spices (such as cardamom, saffron, cinnamon, black lime, bay leaves and nutmeg).

countries.NAME: Sudan
countries.DESCRIPTION: Ful medames is a breakfast dish of mashed fava beans with onions, spices and oil, with boiled egg served on top.

countries.NAME: S. Sudan
countries.DESCRIPTION: Ful medames is a breakfast dish of mashed fava beans with onions, spices and oil, with boiled egg served on top.

countries.NAME: Senegal
countries.DESCRIPTION: Thiéboudienne is a one pot dish of fish, rice and vegetables (such as potato, pumpkin and cassava) that are cooked in a tomato sauce

countries.NAME: Singapore
countries.DESCRIPTION: Hainanese chicken rice is a dish of steamed rice and chicken topped with soy sauce, coriander and sesame oil, often served with a garlic-chilli dip.

countries.NAME: Solomon Is.
countries.DESCRIPTION: Poi is a savoury paste, typically served as a side dish, made from rinsed taro roots.

countries.NAME: Sierra Leone
countries.DESCRIPTION: Cassava leaf stew (or soup) is prepared with meat or dish, cassava leaves, peanuts, onion and chilli.

countries.NAME: El Salvador
countries.DESCRIPTION: Pupusas are a type of thick flatbread made from cornmeal or rice flour that can be stuffed with a variety of fillings, such as beans, cheese and meat.

countries.NAME: San Marino
countries.DESCRIPTION: Torta Tre Monti is a cake made from layers of waffled wafers and chocolate or hazlenut cream.

countries.NAME: Somalia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Sambusa are triangular pastries, most often stuffed with spiced lamb or beef and onion.

countries.NAME: Serbia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Gibanica is a layered pastry dish filled with cottage cheese and eggs, with specific recipes ranging between sweet and savoury.

countries.NAME: São Tomé and Principe
countries.DESCRIPTION: Calulu is a fish stew containing vegetables, okra and sweet potato leaves, often served with a cassava paste called funje.

countries.NAME: Suriname
countries.DESCRIPTION: Pom is an oven dish made from meat, citrus, spices, American taro root and other root vegetables.

countries.NAME: Slovakia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Bryndzové halušky is a dish of small potato dumplings with sheeps cheese and bacon.

countries.NAME: Slovenia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Ajdovi vzhajanci are dumplings made from buckwheat, often served as a side with sauerkraut, vegetables, stews and roasted meats (such as veal).

countries.NAME: Sweden
countries.DESCRIPTION: Köttbullar are Swedish meatballs made from pork and veal mince, usually served with a cream sauce.

countries.NAME: Eswatini
countries.DESCRIPTION: Slaai is an avocado salad, often containing peanuts, lemon juice and ginger.

countries.NAME: Seychelles
countries.DESCRIPTION: Octopus curry is a one pot curry dish made using fresh octopus, often based around masala spices, curry leaves, chilli and coconut cream.

countries.NAME: Syria
countries.DESCRIPTION: Kibbeh are meat-filled croquettes made with bulgur wheat and spiced ground lamb.

countries.NAME: Chad
countries.DESCRIPTION: Peanut and squash stew is a simple and hearty stew, primarily consisting of squash, chopped peanuts and spices.

countries.NAME: Togo
countries.DESCRIPTION: Gboma dessi is a stew primarily consisting of spinach, meat (often beef) and tomatoes, which are cooked with onions, garlic, ginger, chilli peppers and a local gbotemi spice blend.

countries.NAME: Thailand
countries.DESCRIPTION: Pad thai is a stir-fried noodle dish containing crushed peanuts, bean sprouts, garlic, egg and some form of protein (tofu, chicken or shrimp).

countries.NAME: Tajikistan
countries.DESCRIPTION: Qurutob is a dish of layers of fatir bread, dried yogurt and vegetables, such as tomatoes, spring onions and herbs.

countries.NAME: Turkmenistan
countries.DESCRIPTION: Ichlekli is a meat pie that is traditionally cooked underground, often containing beef, tomato, onions and peppers.

countries.NAME: Timor-Leste
countries.DESCRIPTION: Batar da'an is a vegetable stew consisting of corn, mung beans and butternut squash.

countries.NAME: Tonga
countries.DESCRIPTION: 'Ota 'ika is a dish of raw fish that is marinated in coconut milk and citrus juice, often served with tomatoes, green onions, cucumbers and hot peppers.

countries.NAME: Trinidad and Tobago
countries.DESCRIPTION: Callaloo is a thick stew of dasheen leaves cooked with spices, coconut milk and other vegetables. It is traditionally served with crab, but other meats can be used.

countries.NAME: Tunisia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Brik is a dish of thin pastry, often wrapped around egg, onion, tuna, harisa and parsley, which is then deep fried.

countries.NAME: Turkey
countries.DESCRIPTION: Kuru fasulye is a stew of white beans and vegetables in a tomato sauce.

countries.NAME: Taiwan
countries.DESCRIPTION: Taiwanese beef noodles is a noodle dish containing braised beef, served in a rich and spicy broth with bok choy, pickled mustard greens, spring onions and corriander.

countries.NAME: Tanzania
countries.DESCRIPTION: Mchicha is a curry of amaranth greens (which can be substituted for spinach) and peanuts cooked with tomatoes, onion, cocnut milk and spices.

countries.NAME: Uganda
countries.DESCRIPTION: Matoke is a curry dish made from mashed green bananas that are cooked with cumin, coriander, cinnamon, pepper, chilli, onion and tomatoes.

countries.NAME: Ukraine
countries.DESCRIPTION: Borsch is a sour beetroot soup usually containing potatoes, cabbage and sometimes other vegetables. It is served with sour cream and sometimes contains meat, often beef.

countries.NAME: Uruguay
countries.DESCRIPTION: Chivito is a sandwich containing beef steak, mozzarella, tomatoes, mayonaise and olives, often with bacon and eggs added.

countries.NAME: United States of America
countries.DESCRIPTION: Hamburgers are sandwiches of cooked patties of ground beef served inside a bread roll, often with other ingreidents such as cheese, lettuce, tomato and pickles.

countries.NAME: Uzbekistan
countries.DESCRIPTION: Plov is a rice dish containing lamb, carrot, onions, garlic and chilli served in a large dish.

countries.NAME: Vatican
countries.DESCRIPTION: Fettucine alla Papalina (or the Pope's Fettuccine) is a creamy pasta dish with parmesan, prosciutto and sometimes peas.

countries.NAME: St. Vin. and Gren.
countries.DESCRIPTION: For this recipe, the breadfruit is traditionally roasted over an open fire whilst the fish is marinated in lemon juice and dusted in flour before being fried.

countries.NAME: Venezuela
countries.DESCRIPTION: Pabellon criollo is a dish of shredded beef served with rice and stewed black beans.

countries.NAME: Vietnam
countries.DESCRIPTION: Pho is a coup of bone broth, noodles, spices and thinly sliced beef, often topped with herbs and bean sprouts.

countries.NAME: Vanuatu
countries.DESCRIPTION: Lap lap is a bakes casserole dish, primarily consisting of grated root vegetables, bananas, coconut milk and sometimes mear that is wrapped in banana leaves and cooked under hot stones.

countries.NAME: Samoa
countries.DESCRIPTION: Oka i'a is a dish of raw fish, usually tuna, that is marinated in lemon juice and coconut vream and served with onion.

countries.NAME: Yemen
countries.DESCRIPTION: Saltah is a meat or vegetable soup that is topped with a fenugreek broth called hilbeh.

countries.NAME: South Africa
countries.DESCRIPTION: Bobotie is a dish of curried minced meat that is topped with a mixture of milk and egg before being baked.

countries.NAME: Zambia
countries.DESCRIPTION: Kalembula is a dish of sweet potato leaves that are fried with onion and tomato and often eaten with nsima, a type of maize flour porridge.

countries.NAME: Zimbabwe
countries.DESCRIPTION: Muboora is a dish of pumpkin leaves, oil, otmatoes, onions and salt, often served with sadza, which is a cornmeal dough or porridge.

countries.NAME: Tuvalu
countries.DESCRIPTION: Coconut tuna is a seafood curry made from locally caught fish and coconut milk, along with onions, ginger, garlic, chillis, spring onions and cucumber.
